build.script:
#! /usr/bin/env zsh

 export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
 [ -s "/opt/homebrew/opt/nvm/nvm.sh" ] && \. "/opt/homebrew/opt/nvm/nvm.sh"

nvm use
npm install

run.script:
#! /usr/bin/env zsh

 export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm"
 [ -s "/opt/homebrew/opt/nvm/nvm.sh" ] && \. "/opt/homebrew/opt/nvm/nvm.sh"

nvm use
npm run dev
